title: PBL (Project-Based Learning) Course Based on Digital Technology Practice Collaboration Education Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of digital engineering and programming
context.additional_context: Provision of a flexible hands-on learning environment based on individual learners' mobile/tablet devices and collaborative tools

learning_goals: 85% or more of learners collaboratively complete digital technology application projects.
90% of learners improve their ability to utilize digital tools in the PBL (Project-Based Learning) process.
Achieve an average learner satisfaction score of 4.5/5.0 or higher at the end of instruction.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
